name: Fresh Out of the Dungeon
description: Fresh Out of the Dungeon is the work of two pre-college students. Built in a one-week period, the game follows an aspiring chef given the chance to prove himself to his king. Tasked with reclaiming stolen ingredients from the castle dungeon, you must maneuver your way through several sokoban-style puzzles to venture further into the depths. Should you complete this task, you will earn your place as the  king's personal chef.
